pullRequest.title: Fixed sql preparation for get admins
pullRequest.bodyText:
Generic method for geting admins is creating an sql from the given
information. There was a missing table specification for the columns in the where clause.
Therefore, it was added.
-There was also problem that methods for geAdmins receive only id and
object name for that. Therefore they were not able to fetch related
objects. However they are not needed for select so the mapping was
simplified.

nodes.bodyText: Is there any reason for these empty lines?
This is not the correct way how to name variables in Java.

commit.message:
Fixed sql preparation for get admins

- Generic method for geting admins is creating an sql from the given
  information. There was a missing table specification for the columns in the where clause.
  Therefore, it was added.
-There was also problem that methods for geAdmins receive only id and
 object name for that. Therefore they were not able to fetch related
 objects. However they are not needed for select so the mapping was
 simplified.
